name: Total Spectrum Advertising
tag_list: marketing, advertising, building-products, manufacturing, architectural, engineering
overview:
If it goes inside a building, outside a building or on a building, chances are we have built its brand.

For almost 30 years, Total Spectrum Advertising has specialized in B2B marketing in the architectural and building products industry. Our target audiences have been engineers, architects, designers, facility managers, contractors and building owners. Our successful stories include products such as flooring, lighting, windows, doors, stucco, paint, security, building maintenance, access control and HVAC. We bring the tremendous insight of our many years of B2B experience and apply it to considered purchase products… bringing the communication to a whole new level.

We are passionate about what we do. We’re passionate about what you do.

As an award-winning, full-service, B2B marketing and advertising agency, we offer a full complement of strategic services from market research to creative development to analytics – all with the sole purpose of achieving your sales and revenue goals.

Our history in the architectural and building products industry has honed our ability to translate technical product and service jargon into benefit-focused creative solutions. Our deep experience in strategic planning and executing effective, highly-creative campaigns for considered purchase products and services will help take your business to new heights.

Once we connect our insight and efficiency, the sky’s the limit.
